name: FocusedGamedev
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: A daily series of motivational quotes, stories, and advice for game developers covering topics like; vision, focus, mindset, productivity tips, and other lessons learned over the past 20 years building games.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
